snippet: Mr. Rambaldi was a special-effects virtuoso who won two Academy Awards for his work on Steven Spielberg’s “E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial” and Ridley Scott’s “Alien.”
abstract: Carlo Rambaldi, a special-effects virtuoso who won two Academy Awards for his work on Steven Spielberg’s ET the Extra-Terrestrial and Ridley Scott’s Alien, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rambaldi was a special-effects virtuoso who won two Academy Awards for his work on Steven Spielberg’s “E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial” and Ridley Scott’s “Alien.”

headline.seo: Carlo Rambaldi, Movie Maestro of Special Effects, Dies at 86
headline.main: Carlo Rambaldi Dies at 86; Maestro of Special Effects in Movies
headline.print_headline: Carlo Rambaldi, 86, Maestro Of Special Effects in Movies
